data: {"concept_id": "motivation", "concept_name": "Character Motivation", "type": "element", "definition": "The why behind choices—desires, fears, and needs that drive action and reaction.", "scope_notes": "Motivation surfaces as SAY, SHOW, or HIDE; potency dials from low→medium→high. Link to desire, choice, consequence, and change.", "axes": "surface|potency", "axis_values": "say|show|hide | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "drive|decision_style|backstory|identity|tension|body_logic", "conflicts_with": "on_the_nose|tell_only|resetting|contradiction_without_setup|flatline", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_motivation_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_motivation_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "signal_id": "sig_say", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "say", "description": "Direct admissions, vows, confessions, mission statements that name the why.", "detection_hint": "Listen for explicit goals, fears, loyalties; crisis/clarity beats.", "false_positive_risks": "Boasts with no follow-through; monologues that never affect choices.", "minimal_example": "“I can’t let my family get hurt again.”", "counterexample": "A motivation speech with zero behavioral echo.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "signal_id": "sig_show", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "show", "description": "Behavior patterns, sacrifices, risks, and habits that reveal the why without naming it.", "detection_hint": "Track repeated acts, costs paid, and choices under pressure.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy action with no consistent thread; coincidence masquerading as motive.", "minimal_example": "She sells the tickets to pay the fee and walks to work for a month.", "counterexample": "Random helpful act that never repeats or costs.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "signal_id": "sig_hide", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "hide", "description": "Denied, masked, or unconscious motive that leaks through contradiction, avoidance, and slips.", "detection_hint": "Evasions, overcompensation, self-sabotage, disproportionate reactions.", "false_positive_risks": "Pure vagueness with no readable clues; red herrings that never resolve.", "minimal_example": "He jokes it off, but circles the date every night before he sleeps.", "counterexample": "Mystery vibes with nothing to infer.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "signal_id": "sig_potency_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Quiet seed: private longings, reversible micro-steps, soft tells.", "detection_hint": "Daydreams, kept objects, tiny detours; low publicness/cost.", "false_positive_risks": "Atmosphere without tie to choice.", "minimal_example": "He saves the flyer but doesn’t call.", "counterexample": "Decorative trinket with no link.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "signal_id": "sig_potency_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Growing fire: voiced wants, concrete steps, risk and resistance; some doubt remains.", "detection_hint": "Schedules change; relationships strain; setbacks met with renewed effort.", "false_positive_risks": "Task montages with total reset.", "minimal_example": "She applies again after a rejection and asks a rival for help.", "counterexample": "Lots of motion but nothing consequential.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "signal_id": "sig_potency_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "All-in: irreversible commitments, public stakes, sacrifices; no Plan B.", "detection_hint": "Ultimatums, oaths, burned bridges; consequences persist.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle without lasting change.", "minimal_example": "He quits on mic and signs the complaint; friends take sides.", "counterexample": "Big scene then everything returns to normal.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "misconception_id": "on_the_nose", "description": "Over-reliance on speeches that explain motive instead of dramatizing it.", "tells": "Frequent declarations unbacked by behavior.", "likely_causes": "Mistaking clarity for quality.", "corrective_feedback": "Balance SAY with SHOW/HIDE and consequence.", "micro_drill": "Convert a speech into 2 actions + 1 cost.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "misconception_id": "tell_only", "description": "Tells desire without linking to choices or stakes.", "tells": "Bio-style motivation paragraphs.", "likely_causes": "Exposition habit.", "corrective_feedback": "Tie motive to decisions that alter options.", "micro_drill": "Cut 5 tell lines; add 3 decisions with cost.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "misconception_id": "resetting", "description": "Choices have no memory; motivation ‘restarts’ each scene.", "tells": "No fallout or persistence.", "likely_causes": "Fear of complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Carry one cost across three scenes.", "micro_drill": "List 3 sticky consequences; keep one alive.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "misconception_id": "contradiction_without_setup", "description": "Actions clash with stated motive with no seeds or triggers.", "tells": "Whiplash behavior justified by plot.", "likely_causes": "Outline-first forcing.", "corrective_feedback": "Seed hints (HIDE) before flips; log triggers.", "micro_drill": "Add 2 early leaks + a hinge beat.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"concept_id": "motivation", "misconception_id": "flatline", "description": "Motivation never changes loudness or form; no evolution.", "tells": "Same beat repeated.", "likely_causes": "Static arc mapping.", "corrective_feedback": "Use potency dials; let surface shift over time.", "micro_drill": "Map Low→Med→High ladder on one thread.", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_motivation_identify_surface_potency", "concept_id": "motivation", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each passage by surface (say/show/hide) and potency (low/medium/high). Justify with one concrete cue.", "expected_features": "Correct surface+potency; cites evidence; notes cost/publicness/consistency.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels + precise evidence + consequence note", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels or evidence off"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include speeches with no follow-through and reset spectacles as traps.", "hint_steps": "1) What proves motive? 2) Who pays? 3) How public?", "variation_axes": "surface|potency", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_motivation_triangulate_say_show", "concept_id": "motivation", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "When SAY and SHOW disagree, decide which motive is truer and explain why.", "expected_features": "Weights behavior > words; cites pattern/cost.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Sharp inference grounded in consistent behavior and cost", "Meets": "Reasonable inference", "Developing": "Vibes-only"}, "distractor_strategy": "False boasts as distractors.", "hint_steps": "1) Gather actions 2) Gather claims 3) Choose the truer motive", "variation_axes": "consistency|cost", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_motivation_convert_say_to_show", "concept_id": "motivation", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Turn a motivation speech into two actions and one consequence that reveal the same motive.", "expected_features": "Behavior replaces exposition; consequence sticks.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear replacement with sticky cost", "Meets": "Some action with partial cost", "Developing": "Still tell-first"}, "distractor_strategy": "Pretty monologues as traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick two revealing actions 2) Add a cost 3) Remove the speech", "variation_axes": "behavior|cost", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_motivation_reveal_hidden", "concept_id": "motivation", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "A scene hides motive too well. Add readable leaks (gestures, slips, contradictions) that hint at the true why.", "expected_features": "HIDE becomes legible via cues; still subtle.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Cues clear yet subtextual", "Meets": "Some legibility", "Developing": "Still opaque"}, "distractor_strategy": "Random red herrings.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose a tell 2) Tie to object/gesture 3) Land one tiny consequence", "variation_axes": "subtext|body_logic", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_motivation_escalate", "concept_id": "motivation", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Escalate a Low → Med → High ladder by adjusting stakes, publicness, and irreversibility.", "expected_features": "Each step raises cost/visibility; no adjective inflation.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Crisp ladder with sticky changes", "Meets": "Some escalation", "Developing": "Wordier, same stakes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Adjective-only edits.", "hint_steps": "1) Raise cost 2) Widen audience 3) Remove the back door", "variation_axes": "stakes|publicness|irreversibility", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_motivation_1", "concept_id": "motivation", "axis_value": "say|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "“I’ll fix this if it kills me.” He slides the resignation letter across the desk.", "context_tags": "vow|cost", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_motivation_2", "concept_id": "motivation", "axis_value": "show|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "She cancels the trip, sells the guitar, and books the class anyway.", "context_tags": "sacrifice|persistence", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_motivation_3", "concept_id": "motivation", "axis_value": "hide|low", "label": "strong", "text": "He laughs it off, but the browser tab with ‘night classes’ is always open.", "context_tags": "avoidance|tell", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_motivation_4", "concept_id": "motivation", "axis_value": "show|high", "label": "strong", "text": "She signs the complaint on camera and texts the group: ‘Post it.’", "context_tags": "public|irreversible", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_motivation_5", "concept_id": "motivation", "axis_value": "say|low", "label": "strong", "text": "“I just want them safe,” he whispers, folding the map until the crease hides their street.", "context_tags": "fear|family", "source_file": "Character Motivation.md", "source_md5": "b4b2e204c66a7d2f6d49d86852090793", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:36:25.375658Z"}
